title: Strictly Come Dancing 2019: Does Karim Zeroual have a girlfriend?
text:
Karim has chosen to keep his relationship out of the spotlight (Picture: Amy_Dowden/Instagram)

It’s been a quick recovery for Karim Zeroual, who managed to top last night’s Strictly Come Dancing leaderboard following his bout of flu earlier in the week.

Karim’s dance to George Ezra’s Paradise, together with partner Amy Dowden, impressed the judges this week, earning them a near-perfect score of 38.

But who is Karim wooing off-camera? Find out here.

Does Karim Zeroual have a girlfriend and who is she?

The 25-year-old CBBC presenter is reportedly dating University student Poppy Birtwistle.

The couple, who are said to have been together since 2016, have largely kept their relationship away from the spotlight.

Karim and Poppy have reportedly been together for three years (Picture: BBC/Poppy Hannah Birtwistle/Facebook)

They are not often pictured publicly together as a couple, although Poppy previously posted some snaps of her and Karim on her Instagram account, which is now private.

Since Strictly started, she has shared a number of photos including one of her and Karim together with dancer Amy and her fiance, Ben Jones.

More recently, on 30 September, she shared a selfie with Courtney Act, together with the caption: ‘Celebrating my boy being at the top of the leader board with the one and only! @courtneyact ‘bbcstrictly #strictlycomedancing.’

On the same weekend, Amy posted some backstage snaps, with Karim and Poppy looking cosy together on the couch.

She captioned the images: ‘what a night! I’m so proud of your performance, hard work and dedication! THANK YOU! I think our faces say it all in picture no.2 😂! Can’t wait to get back to the studio for week 2! Thank you to our friends and family for all their support and all the lovely feedback we have received! Lots of love #teamdowzer ❤️’

According to Poppy’s Twitter and Instagram bio, she is currently an English student in Manchester.

Has Karim said anything about their relationship?

It seems that despite their fiery tango and on-stage chemistry, Karim and Amy are unlikely contenders to fall for the Strictly curse as both seem pretty settled with their partners, with Amy getting engaged on New Year’s Eve last year.

Even though Karim has not spoken about their relationship publicly, judging by Amy’s photos, he and Poppy seem pretty loved up too…

Poppy hung out with the Strictly crew backstage (Picture: Amy_Dowden/Instagram)

Karim and Amy earned plaudits from the judges last night for their performance with Craig Revel Horwood saying: ‘Well I think it’s the first time we’re really seeing a male celebrity lead and it is incredible.’

We’ll say!

Strictly Come Dancing continues tonight at 7:15pm on BBC One.
